Burnt bat is the result of failing to cook a raw bat within the Chambers of Xeric. Upon burning the bat, it is automatically dropped on the floor.

[[File:Burnt bat detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Burnt bat''' is the result of failing to cook a raw bat within the [[Chambers of Xeric]]. Upon burning the bat, it is automatically dropped on the floor.
